messages.title: Vote Conservative to get Brexit done in Easington!
messages.content: Dear Voter, The Easington constituency has been dominated by the Labour Party for decades but it has taken the loyalty of voters for granted and let people down. No wonder I am meeting so many disillusioned former Labour voters on the doorstep. Only a Conservative vote will guarantee our exit from the EU. No other party has a deal in place. Let's get Brexit done in January so that we can heal divisions and focus on building a better future for Easington and our families. Elect me as your next MP and I will fight for Easington. I will fight for the investment, jobs and regeneration that you deserve. No longer will we have to suffer the damage caused by decades of Labour neglect. In Westminster I am more than a paper power and I can guarantee that no ear will go unbent and no arm untwisted to deliver my plan for Easington. Elect me as your next MP to represent the people and work hard for you. Together we can realize Easington's potential. Best Wishes, Clare Ambrosino, Conservative Parliamentary Candidate

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only a Conservative vote will guarantee our exit from the EU. Let's get Brexit done in January.
Investing an extra £33.9 billion into the NHS. Helping improve your local hospitals and GP services.
Hiring 20,000 new police officers to help make your streets safer.
More funding for every pupil in every school, so our children get a better start in life.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives came second to Labour here at the last general election up 10%. Only Clare Ambrosino can beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party in Easington and get Brexit done!
